Title: Clare
Plot: For 15 years, Clare Matheson attended National Women's Hospital in Auckland where she was unwittingly part of a study that would become known as 'The Unfortunate Experiment?. Without their knowledge or consent, women with symptoms of possible cervical cancer had normal treatment withheld, so that the disease?s progress could be studied. Many went on to develop invasive cancer, and eight died. Known as ?patient Ruth?, Matheson became the key whistleblower in a battle that would result in a landma
